title: Cant create more than 1 custom rune...... help
body:
Hi

I reached lvl 15 and as every accounts i have 2 custom slots for runes. Reaching lvl 15 allows me to fully customize my runes since i unlocked everything ( first and second path)

So i created the first rune and its ok.

Then i clicked the "create new" button in order to customize the second one. I chose the "first path" but after that it seems i got a bugged window which shows all my runes ( preset+ the 1 customized before) with an "x" button on the top right. It seems like the pop-up for the rune creation is open but its kinda "invisible" exept for the "x" to close it.

I did a manual restoration of the client through the settings but nothing happened.

Can someone help, please?

replies.body:
Let's test something to see if this helps really quickly. Do a config reset using the steps below to see if that pushes through a reset (keep in mind you'll have to setup your runes again if this works as well as any custom keybinds and such).

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Hi,

I followed the steps but it changes nothing.....

Hmmm alrighty. Since a repair and config reset won't work, it must be something else messing up within the client. Do me a favor and reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the steps I had you try, and send them your game logs as well. 

They'll be able to look much deeper at what's going on, and should be able to find some kind of fix by trying a few different steps!

Im from eu west and i already sent a support ticket through the eu website but the riot techs cant find any solution....

So i decided to post here, on the na boards hoping for additional help

I also found another guy with the same problem: https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/bYLutJ8m-cant-create-second-rune-page

But there isnt any working fix yet.

Donno what to do...
Update: its not exactly the second rune but the last one. I bought 2 runes slots today (so its 4 total slots) and now i can customize 3 of them. The last one is bugged.
Have you found any solution? I have the same problem and support doesn't answer me.
